bill.title: Bail reform; enact.
bill.description: An Act To Reform Bail Procedures; To Provide When Release On Bail Shall Be Authorized; To Provide Conditions For Release; To Authorize Temporary Detention For Revocation Of Release; To Provide For Detention And Detention Hearings; To Provide Factors For Consideration; To Provide For The Contents Of Release And Detention Orders; To Provide For Release Or Detention Pending Sentence And Appeal; To Provide For The Arrest Of Persons; To Provide For The Review Of Release Orders And Appeals Therefrom; To Provide Penalties For Violations Of This Act; To Provide For Sanctions And Revocation Of Release; To Provide For Surrender Of An Offender By A Surety; To Amend Sections 99-5-11, 99-5-13, 99-5-15, 99-5-25, 99-5-27, 99-5-31, 99-5-33, 99-5-35, 99-5-37, 99-5-38, 99-5-39, 99-35-1, 99-35-3, 99-35-5, 99-35-7, 99-35-9, 99-35-11, 99-35-13, 99-35-101, 99-35-103, 99-35-109, 99-35-111, 99-35-113, 99-35-115, 99-35-117, 99-35-119 And 99-35-129, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity; And For Related Purposes.
